text:
This mackerel miso set meal...!
It's incredibly delicious.

The staff recommended this restaurant, and I must say,
I'm impressed. The fried chicken here is also exceptional.

The exquisite seasoning that smoothly enters the tired body
from the morning's work... The meticulously removed small bones...

The side dish is perfect for resting the chopsticks...
Overall, the balance of the meal is well thought out.

For Hiori to praise it so highly, it must be something.
But still...

Hiori's comments earlier were so descriptive that even
though I haven't eaten, I can imagine the taste.

Ah!
Hiori might be suited for gourmet reporting jobs as well.

Gourmet reporting...
I wonder if I could handle that...
